update device_info set device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_mac = #{deviceMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_pic_url = #{devicePicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_locationId = #{deviceLocationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_location = #{deviceLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firm_id = #{firmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, definition_id = #{definitionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_putaway = #{isPutaway,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_hired = #{isHired,jdbcType=CHAR}, device_desc = #{deviceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_stock = #{deviceStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_rental = #{deviceRental,jdbcType=REAL}, device_deposit = #{deviceDeposit,jdbcType=REAL}, device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_spec = #{deviceSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isDel = #{isdel,jdbcType=CHAR}, networking_type = #{networkingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, b.`brand_name` AS brandName, f.`firm_name` AS firmName, t.`device_type_name` AS deviceTypeName, d.`definition_name` AS definitionName FROM device_info o LEFT JOIN `device_brands` b ON o.`brand_id` = b.`id` LEFT JOIN `device_firms` f ON o.`firm_id` = f.`id` LEFT JOIN `device_type` t ON o.`device_type` = t.`id` LEFT JOIN `device_definition` d ON o.`definition_id` = d.`id` WHERE o.`id` = #{0}
SELECT i.* FROM device_info i WHERE i.`device_name` = #{firmName} AND i.`id` != #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

(#{item.deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.devicePicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deviceLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.firmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isPutaway,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.isHired,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.deviceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deviceStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.deviceRental,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.deviceDeposit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.deviceSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.isdel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.networkingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.definitionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.managerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
